title: Somehow DC'd in ban phase for my Promos. Twice.
body:
Twice in my recent promo series, I would: load into lobby, select a champ, be unable to click on Ban because it wasnt registering it.

The timer ends and then a prompt appears saying would I like to stay connected to League of Legends or would I like to Exit Now.

It happened once on my first game in my promos so I thought it was a fluke. I managed to win the second game with 0 issues and was looking forward to 3rd game.

It happened again. I highly doubt anything can be done about it by Riot for me but I need to at least share the problem. It really sucks to get screwed out of ranking up like this. I dont know what caused the issue. Any help out there would be appreciated.

replies.body: SAME! It keeps freezing on me and i have to force close. I'm scared to get into queue again because now im at 3lp. and will most likely get demoted into bronze if it does it again. So frustrating! Riot!!!! fix please!!!

Since this isn't happening consistently, there's a pretty good chance this was just a fluke with a hiccup in your connection. Even still, let's go ahead and run through some quick troubleshooting steps to see if adjusting your network a bit might help. Check out the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to start troubleshooting this, and be sure you test the changes in a custom match so that you don't get any penalties.
